title: Hera Pheri (2000)
summary: Three unemployed men find the answer to all their money problems when they receive a call from a kidnapper. However, things do not go as planned.

title: Asur: Welcome to Your Dark Side
summary: A unique crime thriller that pits two opposing worlds against each other. The less explored, intricate world of forensic science and the deep mysticism of ancient Indian Mythology.

title: Mirzapur
summary: A shocking incident at a wedding procession ignites a series of events entangling the lives of two families in the lawless city of Mirzapur.
